___snapshot.documentation: A partial representation of a snapshot used in the creation process.

___name.documentation: Name of the snapshot. The default is None.

___volume_id.documentation: To create a snapshot from an existing volume, specify the ID of the existing volume.

___force.documentation: [True/False] Indicate whether to snapshot, even if the volume is attached. Default==False.

___description.documentation: Description of the snapshot. The default is None.
